name: Click Tower
description:
Click Tower is a Clicker merged with a Tower defense. You'll have to click the tower to shoot arrows and generate gold. HOLD THE LINE!

This is a game we threw out in a couple of weeks mainly to explore a new Game Engine (Defold). You basically win in 10 minutes of playtime but the concept is interesting.

Art by Marta Montes at https://itch.io/profile/martamontesserra

Game Design by Eric Fullà

Sound by Mikel Quereda

Programming by Mikel Quereda and Eric Fullà
